summary: An ENB that focuses on improving extremely the graphics! Putting Skyrim into another level of immersion.
descriptionHtml:
[i]version 1.0[/i]
[center][IMG]http://i939.photobucket.com/albums/ad238/Cucobr/cucobrrealisticENB-1.jpg[/IMG][/center]

Features:
[img]http://forum.imguol.com//forum/images/smiles/icon_arrow.gif[/img] Realistic Illumination
[img]http://forum.imguol.com//forum/images/smiles/icon_arrow.gif[/img] High quality Bloom and SSAO
[img]http://forum.imguol.com//forum/images/smiles/icon_arrow.gif[/img] Special effect in beams of sunlight (godrays)
[img]http://forum.imguol.com//forum/images/smiles/icon_arrow.gif[/img] Nights realistic.
[img]http://forum.imguol.com//forum/images/smiles/icon_arrow.gif[/img] Bokeh Deep of Field
[img]http://forum.imguol.com//forum/images/smiles/icon_arrow.gif[/img] Vibrant lights
[img]http://forum.imguol.com//forum/images/smiles/icon_arrow.gif[/img] Rich colors
[img]http://forum.imguol.com//forum/images/smiles/icon_arrow.gif[/img] Water color photo-realistic
[img]http://forum.imguol.com//forum/images/smiles/icon_arrow.gif[/img] Retina\'s effect
[img]http://forum.imguol.com//forum/images/smiles/icon_arrow.gif[/img] And more ...


[IMG]http://i939.photobucket.com/albums/ad238/Cucobr/installation.jpg[/IMG]


[[PRE-INSTALL]]

Download and install: Realistic Lighting Overhaul by Sydney666 and Daemonui (very important)
Current Version: 4.0.6
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450

In the Skyrim load order disable:
Realistic Lighting Overhaul - 3.5 Dawnguard Weathers
Realistic Lighting Overhaul - 3.5 Weathers.esp

----

Download and install: ENBSeries v0.146 or newer ( http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm )
( Preferably the InjectorVersion )



[[INSTALL]]


1 - In the file SkyrimPrefs.ini at adress \"C:\\Users\\xxxxxx\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\"

Change the following lines:
bFloatPointRenderTarget=0 to bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=0 to bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=0 to bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=0 to bShadowsOnGrass=1

2 - Save the document and you can close it.

3 - Take all the 10 files of the contents of the \"Main Files\" from Cucobr\'s realistic ENB and copy it to the main folder of the game (eg \"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\").

4 - Make a program shortcut \"ENBInjector.exe\" to your desktop.

5 - Execute ENBInjector.exe

6 - Execute Skyrim

[color=red][b]***Alert***[/b] Cucobr\'s realistic ENB was made only to run together of [u]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/u]. If you have another lighting mod, disable it. I can\'t guarantee the same quality of image if you use another lighting mode.[/color]


[IMG]http://i939.photobucket.com/albums/ad238/Cucobr/Screenshots-1.jpg[/IMG]
[b]Comparison between Skyrin Vanilla and my ENB at image section.[/b]

[i]If you took screenshots using my ENB... Hey! Send to me! I\'ll analyze and post here![/i] =)
